short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Marks selected links as visited. If nothing is selected - marks all links on page as visited.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Picture will explain it all...

Extension also has some context menus for link and selection. And it can even unmark links via context menu of extension icon.

Please note that extension does not colorize links, it just puts them in browser history. If visited and unvisited links on some site look the same, then you also need some other extension to distinguish them.
